item.title: Using Compose Beta on AS 4.1
item.description: Jetpack Compose hit Beta! Many teams are excited to experiment with Compose, but as you might know, since 1.0.0-alpha04, the compiler has been refactored to a new group and became incompatible with the current Android Studio (AS) 4.1 stable: Compose Version 1.0.0-alpha04 is only compatible with Android Studio 4.2 Canary 13 and later.
